name: Robiul Islam Rbs
quote: Excellent service, very patient and dedicated. They solved all my doubts and I received a full scholarship.
story: I applied for BSc in Computer Science and Technology and got a Full Scholarship. DemoticEdu guided me step-by-step—from documents to university selection—and always answered quickly.

name: Ahsan Habib Shuvo
story: Very smooth process. I’m happy with the communication and the final offer with a partial scholarship.

name: Rafi Mn
university: Changzhou Vocational College of Information Technology
quote: I really appreciate the service of this consultancy. I’m working now in Bangladesh, thanks to their help.
story: Clear guidance for admission and visa steps. Even without scholarship, the placement matched my goals.

name: Lina Akter
quote: Got admission with partial scholarship. The team reviewed my SOP and improved it a lot.
story: My counselor helped me tailor SOP and recommendation letters—made a big difference.

name: Tanvir Hasan
quote: Full scholarship and a great lab! Thank you for the professor matching support.
story: They helped me contact potential supervisors and prepare a strong research proposal.

name: Faria Noor
quote: The language program was the perfect start—great city and safe campus.
story: Visa support and pre-departure checklist were super helpful. Highly recommended.
